item.title: TTD
item.description: score:56 Chances: The Trade Desk Inc. is a technology platform for advertising buyers, offering products such as audio advertising, mobile advertising, and data management platform. The company has experienced support from investors like Ark Invest and Cathie Wood, showing a strong backing from influential figures in the industry.
